body: Hey everyone! I hope you enjoyed your day off Andrew!

To catch you up Andrew, I need you to deploy a fake door website for me. Same way you usually do it. I asked Brian and Morgan yesterday while you were out, but they haven't learned how to do this yet.
Gotcha. @Brian and @Morgan -- do either of you have access to the build server?
I don't think I do either. Not too sure what that is.
Our team's build server is where our CI/CD pipelines are run. It's a server with permission to clone repos from GitHub and then run scripts to do things like test and deploy our projects.
For Sophia's experiments, she uses Wix which handles nearly everything for us, but we just need to use the build server to manually create the domain cert validation.
I'll take care of this now for you @Sophia. And then @Brian and @Morgan let's get you two access and then I can go through this process with you for the future.

@Brian can you reach out to Tom to create you a private cloud login so that you can access our build server? And then @Morgan you'll just need to reach out to Renata for that, since the rule here is that it requires manager signoff.
Cool. Let me know once you guys have login access and then I'll do a demo with you.
